message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $9,500 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product will bring you significant value at $10,000. I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $8,750 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our discussions.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's meet in the middle at $8,875. This is a very fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
